snippet.title: Mini Ghost Official Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
"Mini Ghost" is a mini metroidvania in the 80's MSX art style and gameplay. It's the mini prequel of Ghost 1.0.

Store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/586880
Release date: 28th of April 2017
Price: $1,99 / 1,99€
Platform: Steam (Windows)
